name: Dinner Tonight: Green Bean Salad With Cream
description: More green beans? I had lots of skirt steak left over from my Monday binge, and so I needed a little green to side along with all that beef that had to be eaten. These beans were hanging around, and...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/4 pounds green beans, preferably haricots verts

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add the beans. Cook until tender, about 5-8 minutes, depending on the size. Drain, and then dump in ice water to stop cooking. Drain again, and then set in the fridge.
Mix the lemon juice, minced shallot, and creme fraiche in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Combine the creamy mixture with the beans, garnish with the attractive chives, and eat.
